diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Salmonella gastroenteritis with Diarrhea, Hypotension, CML, Gastritis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient presented with symptoms including persistent significant diarrhea, abdominal pain, and lightheadedness, along with imaging findings of multiple sigmoid diverticula and areas of wall thickening suggestive of chronic diverticular changes, ruling out other gastrointestinal issues.
